statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandName , AA.EngName , AA.ShortName , AA.Description , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.BMBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.BrandName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.EngName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.ShortName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandName , AA.EngName , AA.ShortName , AA.Description , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.BMBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMBrand ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, BrandName, EngName, ShortName, Description, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #BrandName#, #EngName#, #ShortName#, #Description#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMBrand SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, BrandName = #BrandName# , EngName = #EngName# , ShortName = #ShortName# , Description = #Description# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
